title: Mixed bean salad
description: Grab that tin of beans from the back of your store cupboard and whip up this simple salad. Each serving provides 107kcal, 3g protein, 8g carbohydrate (of which	2g sugars), 6g fat (of which 1g saturates),	4g fibre and 0.1g salt.
ingredients: 1 x 400g tin mixed bean salad, drained and rinsed
1 large tomato, deseeded and finely diced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
